DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effectiveness POWER Through Choices ( PTC ) curriculum increase contraceptive use delay sexual initiation among youth live group foster care home .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Effectiveness POWER Through Choices Program
DOC.detailed_description: Youth foster care especially high risk teen pregnancy associate sexual risk behavior . The POWER Through Choices ( PTC ) program 10-session sexuality curriculum aim increase contraceptive use delay sexual initiation empower youth make healthy , positive choice sexual behavior . This study use cluster randomized design compare effectiveness PTC usual program service provide youth live group foster care home . Study participant youth live group foster home recruit four location : Kern County , CA ; Cook County , IL ; Baltimore County , MD ; Oklahoma ( statewide ) . The study conduct part national Evaluation Adolescent Pregnancy Prevention Approaches fund Office Adolescent Health U.S. Department Health Human Services .
DOC.criteria: Resident group foster care home Pregnant parenting
